#
# List of IPs/Subnets that have been blocked due to malicious traffic on at least one client.
#
# This list is best used as a blocklist against access attempts to publicly facing portals such as login pages. Most of these IPs were captured due to attempted bruteforce attacks.
#
# If a subnet is listed, it's because there were at least 5 different IPs in that range identified, AND, the ISP did not respond to requests for resolution within 48 hours(Excluding weekends) of a report. 
#
# If you'd like to appeal a ban, please submit via the Issues tab.
#
#
